asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=18695022
CreativeWare™ 1.5-Gallon Beverage Dispenser is stackable and can be easily placed in a refrigerator to keep beverages chilled. Has a drip-proof spigot for ease of dispensing. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Hi I'm Nancy from bed bath and beyond and I'm here to tell you about this fabulous beverage dispenser. It holds 1 and 1/2 gallons of your favorite cold beverage. It's made of b.p.a. free plastic and it comes with three pieces a dispenser with spec and. Ensure that. Not only is this beverage dispenser great looking but it's perfect for both entertaining and everyday use for your family. You can fill it with your favorite beverage and without the base set it directly on the refrigerator shelf and they can help themselves to a cold drink any time for entertaining. First fill it with a beverage. Put it in the refrigerator and chill before you're ready to serve when your guests arrive. Set it on top of the base and they can conveniently help themselves to a cold drink. If you purchase two units you can stack them and then you can offer your guests two different drinks. You'll love using this both indoors and outdoors. This beverage dispenser is available online and it has bed bath and beyond store near you.
